name: Random Weapons
description:
Its my second game a good game it took a lot of time to develop but its here.

Its a first person shooter battlefield like game, with tons of weapons.

Its has 3 maps with 15+ weapons but i will update it adding weapons, maps gamemodes, and fixing bugs.

Comment what you want in game or what you do not want, also comment for bugs.

Please give a try to the game.

-This version supports Mac,Windows and Linux.

"USE THIS RESOLUTION (1280 * 720) other can cause interface bugs, i will fix that"
